desc.p: Presently, if the passbook is updated once- then reprinting of entries is not possible. To overcome such short comings this application is introduced. The application contains the following new fields

tr.td: The account number whose entries has to be printed
Date from which the entries has to be printed. If null, then the date on which the passbook was printed first will be defaulted
Date till which entries of the account has to be printed, if null today's date will be defaulted.
To display the message (passbook update, Abort, Reprint) for browser
The processing will be taken place according to the input in the field (Y, A, R) for browser

desc.p: This field indicates the date from which passbook entries have to be reprinted. If no value is entered then all the entries starting from the first passbook entry will get reprinted.

Validation rules This is an optional field. Should not be less than PURGE.DATE or RETENTION.PERIOD in ARCHIVE. Should not be greater than TODAY. Should be greater or equal to the first passbook printed date."
The field specifies the account for which the passbook is to be reprinted.Mandatory input.Should be a valid passbook account.
This field indicates the date upto which the passbook entries have to be reprinted. If no value is entered then all the entries upto TODAY will get reprinted.
This is an optional field. Should not be greater than TODAY. Should not be lesser than the START.DATE."
